alert.note: Alert for Dane (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:18AM CDT until April 05 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN GREEN AND SOUTHWESTERN DANE COUNTIES... At 518 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Horeb, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Western Madison, Fitchburg, Middleton, Verona, Oregon, Mount Horeb, Cross Plains, Belleville, New Glarus, Brooklyn, Monticello, Blue Mounds, Dayton, Attica, Paoli, Pine Bluff, and Mount Vernon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
